scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix react-portfolio && npm run build --prefix react-portfolio && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');if(!fs.existsSync('dist'))fs.mkdirSync('dist',{recursive:true});const src='react-portfolio/dist';const dest='dist';fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file=>{const srcPath=path.join(src,file);const destPath=path.join(dest,file);if(fs.lstatSync(srcPath).isDirectory()){fs.cpSync(srcPath,destPath,{recursive:true})}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath)}})"
